ygData.subject: RE:  Terrorantula (Not about bards specifically)
ygData.msgSnippet: I ran into Mr Terror while heading to Cazic Thule for my corpse.  I figured he was like other spiders and wouldn t attack, even though it said ready to
ygData.messageBody:
I ran into Mr Terror while heading to Cazic Thule for my corpse. I figured
he was like other spiders and wouldn't attack, even though it said 'ready to
attack'. I went up to take a snap shot (real close, since it was with my
barbarian that I encountered him and I just barely reached his under belly).
Bit me twice for 90 damage each - I didn't get the screen shot either - I
just turned and ran for the zone. Luckily I didn't get poisoned.

Cwelenas, Minstrel of the 8th Chord
Angarth Bladedancer, Warrior of the 21st Tier
"Periissem ni periisem"


> ----------
> From: Michal Hobson[SMTP:given@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Sent: Saturday, July 24, 1999 4:38 AM
> To: EQBards
> Subject: [eqbards] Why me?
>
> Hail and well met again fellow bards!
>
> I had the most horrendous day today and I have finished it with one piece
> of advice for those on the list more newbie than myself. DON'T GO TO
> INNOTHULE SWAMP WITHOUT A DAMN GOOD MAP OR GUIDE!!!!!! A friend of mine
> thought it would be fun if we could attempt a foray into Guk. I'm game of
> course, so we head off. After arriving, and dying once (they run and get
> their older brothers there when they get hurt) and coming back, we
> received the word of God saying it was going to be lights out for a bit on
> Erollisi Marr. I camped and came back when the server was back. So now I
> wanted to go home to familiar climes. I though I knew the way, but when a
> troll slayer started laying into me for 40 pts of damage per hit I
> panicked and took off running. It just so happened that I ran straight to
> the zone entrance to Grobb! So I died again. Then I went to attempt a
> corpse loot. Guess what? You got it--died. So I tried one more time
> AND....drum roll please.......DIED!!!
>
> I finally made a troll character, consented him to loot me (3 times) and
> ran to South Ro where the orcs promptly killed that character. So I
> consented the other me (the bard me) to loot the troll me. Needless to
> say, after around 3 hours and 2 experience bubbles lost later, I'm back.
>
> Guess where we headed then.....
>
> The moral of the story is KNOW YOU'RE SURROUNDINGS!!! Or just have fun
> and die a lot.
> Just trying to lighten up the list after the last 2 threads have hopefully
> flamed out!!
>
> Weiland of Freeport
> Erollisi Marr
>
> P.S. Has anyone else encountered Terrorantula? He ate our lunch today
> too. I had never even heard of him or her whatever it is. It has to be
> the biggest creature I have seen to date. Anyone else have a fun
> encounter with this behemoth? Feel free to share.
>
>
